defaultViewDistance.name: デフォルトのグリッド表示距離
defaultViewDistance.hint: 表示されるグリッド数を設定します。

usePropertyBasedDistance.name: コマのプロパティに基づいた距離を使用する
usePropertyBasedDistance.hint: Use a token property instead of `Default Grid View Distance`

propertyDistance.name: コマのプロパティ
propertyDistance.hint: Path to the Token property to be used to determine the size of the grid.

defaultViewShape.name: デフォルトのグリッド表示形式
defaultViewShape.hint: グリッド・マスクの形を設定します。

enableOnCombatOnly.name: 戦闘時のみ
enableOnCombatOnly.hint: Grid will only be shown when in combat.

enableOnControl.name: On Control
enableOnControl.hint: Grid will be shown for controlled placeables.

enableOnHover.name: ホバー時
enableOnHover.hint: Grid will be shown for hovered over placeables.

mixColors.name: Mix Colors
mixColors.hint: When enabled view shape colors will be mixed/blended together.

assignDispositionBasedColor.name: Assign Color Based on Disposition
assignDispositionBasedColor.hint: When enabled Token view shape colors will default to their disposition:

enableOnRuler.name: Enable Tactical Grid For Ruler
enableOnRuler.hint: Enables grid for Ruler Measurements (requires libWrapper to be active).

measurementPrecision.hint: Decimal precision that measured distances are to be displayed in.

rulerColor.hint: Set a color for the ruler grid. If no color is set then it will use the grid color of the scene.

includeElevation.name: Include Elevation
includeElevation.hint: Should elevation be included in distance measurements?

shortestDistance.name: 最短距離のみ
shortestDistance.hint: Only the shortest distance to the token will be shown.

gridlessCircle.name: グリッド無し： 円形の輪郭
gridlessCircle.hint: If enabled, on gridless scenes the module will calculate shortest distance assuming the Token border is a circle.

settings.scaleFontSize: Scale Font Size to Canvas Grid

baseGridSize.name: Base Grid Size
baseGridSize.hint: Grid smaller or larger than this will result in Font Size being scaled proportionally.

cover.name: Cover Calculator
cover.hint: If a cover calculator is selected and corresponding module enabled; cover information will be displayed under measurements.

toggleGrid.name: 現在レイヤにグリッドをトグル（グローバル）
toggleGrid.hint: 短く押下でグローバル（全シーン）にレイヤーをトグルし、長押しで現在のシーンにだけレイヤーをトグルします。
